name: Plan I - Organic Pescatarian Muscle Builder

Breakfast.details: Organic Smoked Salmon Protein Bagel: 1 organic whole grain bagel, 4 oz organic smoked salmon, 2 tbsp organic cream cheese, 1 organic egg (scrambled), 1/4 organic avocado, 1 tbsp organic capers
Breakfast.instructions: Toast bagel. Layer with cream cheese, smoked salmon, scrambled egg, avocado, and capers.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Greek Yogurt Power Bowl: 1 cup organic Greek yogurt, 1 scoop organic vanilla protein powder, 1/4 cup organic granola, 1/2 cup organic mixed berries, 1 tbsp organic chia seeds, 1 tbsp organic honey
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Mix yogurt with protein powder. Top with granola, berries, chia seeds, and honey.

Lunch.details: Organic Tuna Quinoa Salad: 1 can organic tuna (in olive oil), 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic mixed greens, 1/4 cup organic cherry tomatoes, 1/4 organic cucumber, 2 tbsp organic olive oil, juice of 1/2 organic lemon
Lunch.instructions: Mix tuna, quinoa, and vegetables. Dress with olive oil and lemon juice.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Rice Cakes with Nut Butter: 2 organic brown rice cakes, 2 tbsp organic almond butter, 1 organic banana (sliced), 1 tsp organic cinnamon
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Spread almond butter on rice cakes. Top with banana slices and sprinkle with cinnamon.

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Protein-Packed Smoothie: 1.5 scoops organic pea protein powder, 1 cup organic coconut milk, 1/2 cup organic frozen mango, 1/2 cup organic spinach, 1 tbsp organic flaxseed oil

Dinner.details: Organic Baked Cod with Quinoa Pilaf: 8 oz organic cod fillet, 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic roasted vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, onions), 2 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 tbsp organic lemon juice, 1 tbsp organic herbs (parsley, dill)
Dinner.instructions: Bake cod. Cook quinoa with roasted vegetables. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, sprinkle with herbs.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Cottage Cheese and Fruit Bowl: 1 cup organic cottage cheese, 1/2 cup organic pineapple chunks, 1/4 cup organic chopped walnuts, 1 tbsp organic honey
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix cottage cheese with pineapple chunks. Top with walnuts and drizzle with honey.
